summary: The Contoso Wireless streaming service offers customers access to high-quality video and audio content on their device. The service is compatible with iOS and Android mobile devices, as well as laptops and desktops running Windows or Mac OS. Subscription plans start at $5 per month, and customers get access to exclusive content, unlimited downloads, and a 7-day free trial. Additionally, there is a 30-day money back guarantee if customers are not completely satisfied with their subscription plan.
